title: 关于MCEDIT的一些问题
author: wa66rpg
txt_content:
我用ME也有一定时间了，各种操作也烂熟于心，不过这次ME的大傲娇实在是让我蛋碎。
如果我拖动tool（选区）MCE就回给我自动复制选区，然而我并没有点击左边的copy 甚至任何按钮。。。。。
之后我尝试了老三套： 重启，重装，重开。 然而还是有这个问题。。。。。。。
。。这里附一下图。。真心求解决。




25.jpg (59.03 KB, 下载次数: 0)

replies.author: Amild
replies.txt_content:
wa66rpg 发表于 2014-3-18 19:00
thank you very much. But I  try to reload the MCEDIT repeatedly, and it has no change。
I real have  ...
谢谢你.但我尝试重新加载mcedit多次，它没有改变。
我真的不理想时，我做的所有的事，我能想到..........女巫
你能给我解决了其他的方式？
嘛= =读不通顺则么办。。具体我再去看下。。很久没用了

replies.author: wa66rpg
replies.txt_content: =A= 真的没骨灰大神回复么

replies.author: Amild
replies.txt_content: 自动复制选区么= =唔。。退回到原界面找下设置内个。。、没记错就是在里边解决

replies.author: Holymaker
replies.txt_content:
Its saying that its saving into a schematic file, however the destination folder is corrupted.
U can try to reinstall MCedit, that should help

replies.author: wa66rpg
replies.txt_content:
thank you very much. But I  try to reload the MCEDIT repeatedly, and it has no change。
I real have no ideal when i do all the thing witch I can think..........
could you give me other way to solve it？
